pages.title: The Rumour DAEMON Engine – 12th February, 2019 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Hey guys! For this week’s Rumour Engine wë’rE trϒing sØmeth⇔ing diffΔℜεΞ∴ …GREETINGS, MORTAL!I HAVE INFESTED YOUR PUNY “RUMOUR ENGINE”! FROM NOW ON, IT SHALL BE KNOWN AS THE DAEMON ENGINE, AND POST ONLY THE MOST EVIL, WARP-TAINTED RUMOURS POSSIBLE! MWAHAHA!THE RUMOUR ENGINE IS ALSO COVERED IN SPIKES NOW, AND ON FIRE. IT LOOKS SUPER AWESOME. LET ME TRY DRAWING IT:IF YOUR MIND IS NOT SHATTERED BY SUCH A TERRIFYING SIGHT, I COMMEND YOU!FOR OUR FIRST SINISTER RUMOUR, I BRING YOU THIS – A GRIM VISION OF YOUR INEVITABLE DEMISE! THERE MAY ALSO BE A MODEL IN THERE, WHO KNOWS. YOU MAY ATTEMPT TO GAIN MY FAVOUR BY GUESSING WHAT THIS IS ON THE WARHAMMER 40,000 FACEBOOK PAGE – BEFORE I RETURN TOMORROW TO BRING YOU MORE TERRIFYING PROGNOSTICATIONS!** THIS, OF COURSE, BEING A PARTICULARLY BAROQUE AND TERRIFYING WAY OF SAYING “STUFF FROM THE FUTURE”.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - June 7th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Where could this be from?Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of Ironskull.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine – 31st July, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
Look into our scrying orb (disguised cunningly as this very web page) and see what you can glimpse of the future…
Guessed what it is yet? Let us know on the Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - January 11th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Well this looks interesting…Share your ideas about what it might be over on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as Vanguard-Palladors.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - April 3rd, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: What mystery has the Rumour Engine unleashed this week? Is it something watery connected to the Idoneth Deepkin? Are we seeing the bony protrusions of one of Nagash’s undead horrors? Have the Haemonculi of the Dark City come up with something new and terrifying? Or are we just throwing out ideas that are designed to mislead you entirely?We’re sure we’ll see your mad ideas on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages – go on, get cracking!UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of a Flesh Hound in Realm of Chaos: Wrath and Rapture.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - January 16th, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Scroll down for a look at this week’s Rumour Engine…We’ve got some thoughts on what it might be, but don’t want to give anything away – what do YOU think it is?Let us know on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of Lotann, Warden of the Soul Ledgers.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine – 23rd April, 2019 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: The Rumour Engine returns with a glimpse of the future, but what could it be?Share your guesses on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - April 5th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Okay, this is mysterious…Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as Horticulous Slimux.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - December 14th - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Let’s see what the Rumour Engine has churned out for us today…What in the name of Sigmar and/or the Emperor could it be?In case you missed it, our previous snippet can be found HERE.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as Yvraine, Emissary of Ynnead.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - March 27th, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: The Rumour Engine is back, opening a portal to the future so we can glimpse the wonders to come. And it looks like a literal portal this week – or maybe more of a hatch. Where does it lead? What is it part of? Start your speculations over on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Sector Imperialis Administratum terrain kit.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - June 28th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: It looks angry… whatever it is.Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as the Celestar Ballista available in Soul Wars.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - February 1st, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Surprise – it’s a rumour! Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Sector Mechanics Ferratonic Furnace.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - May 17th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Hmmm, what have we here?Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of Captain-General Trajann Valoris.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine – 24th Aug, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
NOVA is almost upon us, and with it, a very exciting Studio Preview seminar – until then, here’s another image from the Rumour Engine…
Let us know your thoughts on the Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages – and make sure to check back later in the week for a major raft of reveals.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - February 22nd, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: That’s an interesting little doodad… but what is it?Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as Hakka.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - January 18th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Hmmm, wonder who carries this…? Let us know what you think over on the Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as a piece of Cypher, Lord of the Fallen.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - 5th July, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: This week’s Rumour Engine is a real brain-tickler – what could it be?Let us know what you think on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of Necromunda: Underhive.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine – 25th September, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
Is it a bird? Is it a plane? Or is it a figurehead? It could be anything!
Let us know your best guesses in the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - January 2nd, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: It’s 2018 – who knows what the year ahead might hold? The Rumour Engine does – here’s your first cryptic clue of the year:Let us know what you think it is on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws in the Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Malign Sorcery set.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine: Tuesday 16th April - Warhammer Community
pages.description: The Rumour Engine returns, but can you decode this week’s mysterious image?Share your theories on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine – 18th December, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: If you didn’t like last week’s Rumour Engine, maybe this one will be more your bag?Let us know what you think it could be on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages…

pages.title: The Rumour Engine – 2nd April, 2019 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Conspiracy theories at the ready – it’s Rumour Engine time. Can you guess what this is?Give it your best shot on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.

pages.title: The Daemon Engine – 18th February, 2019 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: MORTALS, THE DEPTH OF YOUR CURIOSITY HAS AMAZED EVEN I! AS IS YOUR WISH, I SHALL GIVE YOU MORE UPCOMING MODELS TO LOOK AT – BUT BEWARE, FOR I HAVE CHOSEN A DELIBERATELY AMBIGUOUS IMAGE. WHAT COULD IT BE? IS YOUR MIND RACING? ARE YOU READY TO GIVE IN? LET ME KNOW ON THE BOOK OF FACES!

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - February 20th, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Something slithers from the shadows – is it one of the serpentine servants of Morathi? No – it’s another exciting Rumour Engine:Let us know what you think this glimpse at an upcoming release might be on the Warhammer 40,000 or Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Van Saar Gang.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Oh hey there. We bet the word ‘rumour’ is what drew you to this article. It would have grabbed our attention too. Speculating wildly about future releases is an essential part of the Warhammer hobby*. To nudge things along a little, we snuck into the Design Studio and snapped a photo of something that’s coming next year. Unfortunately, photography is not our strong suit…Head over to the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages to leave your best guess/outrageous conjecture.See you next week for another game of ‘What am I looking at?!’.*Well, not really, but it sure makes for fun reading!UPDATE: This image has been revealed as the Arkanaut Frigate.

pages.title: Rumour Engine: September 12th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
The Rumour Engine shows no sign of stopping! Any thoughts on what this week’s sneak peek could be?
Let us know what you think on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Spoilpox Scrivener.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - March 29th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Have a look, and see if you have any more luck figuring out what this is than we did…Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as Horticulous Slimux.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - January 9th, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: What does the year ahead hold? The Rumour Engine knows – although it’s being as cryptic as ever…Let us know what you think it is on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of Lotann, Warden of the Soul Ledgers.

pages.title: The Daemon Engine – 14th February, 2019 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: YES MORTAL! THERE REMAIN EVEN MORE SIGHTS TO SHARE WITH YOU! THE OLD RUMOUR ENGINE PUT THE “WEAK” INTO “WEEKLY” * – TO ME, HOWEVER, TIME IS NO BARRIER!FEAST YOUR EYES ON MORE TEMPTATIONS THAT LIE IN THE FUTURE! I ASSUME YOU BASICALLY GET THE GIST BY NOW.YOU HAVE COME CLOSE TO REALISING THE DEPTHS OF OUR DEPRAVITY, MORTAL – SEE IF YOU CAN GUESS WHAT YOU GAZE AT ON THE WARHAMMER 40,000 or WARHAMMER AGE OF SIGMAR FACEBOOK PAGES.* AS A DAEMON, I LOVE PUNS – THE MOST TORMENTING FORM OF HUMOUR.

pages.title: Rumour Engine – June 12th, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
With new releases and reveals coming at us left, right and centre, you’d think the Rumour Engine would be taking a rest this week – but it’s still working to provide us with glimpses of the future. Glimpses like this one…
Can you guess what it is? Let us know your thoughts on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages…UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Genestealer Cults Biophagus.

pages.title: Rumour Engine – June 5th, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
Time for your regular Tuesday brainteaser – can YOU guess what upcoming model this is from?
Let us know your thoughts on the Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages…UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Genestealer Cults Sanctus.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - 5th March, 2019 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
Bzzzzt…./loading social protocol 47b: talking_to_illogical_humans_V2_final_FINAL.imp
/Initiating FRIENDLY_DISCOURSE…Greetings. Epsilon-604, here. We’ve finally managed to remove that Daemon problem with the Rumour Engine. Turns out someone was hiding in a pipe and doing a deep voice. Apologies for any inconvenience!Enjoy an untainted preview of a future model by way of apology.Please submit your conjectures regarding its provenance to the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages. And report any further Nurgling infestations you might find!

pages.title: Rumour Engine - April 19th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Time once more for another wild Wednesday rumour.What are we looking at folks?Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of Spiteclaw’s Swarm.

pages.title: Rumour Engine – 2nd October, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
We’ve got a really difficult one for you this week. Is it some form of armoured tentacle or perhaps the spinal cortex of some serpentine beast? Probably neither!
If you think you might know what it is, let us know on the Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - February 15th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Well, this looks a bit grim… wonder what it could be? Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of a Petitioner.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine – 11th Sept, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
You’d think after NOVA we’d have nothing left to tease, right? WRONG:
If you can guess what this is, let us know on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages – and, if you missed them, check out the latest round of reveals from the NOVA Open.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - January 4th - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Well. This could be… all sorts of things.Let us know your ideas over on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as a Skywarden.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine – Tuesday 9th October - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Tunic? Check. Belt and buckle? Check. Any other ideas? Nope!Do you reckon you know what this image could be from? Let us know on our Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000 Facebook pages.

pages.title: Rumour Engine – May 29th, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description:
Can you guess what this week’s Rumour Engine is?
Let us know on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages…UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Warhammer Underworlds: Nightvault – Mollog’s Mob warband.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - September 26th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: It’s Rumour Engine time, and this one is of something we think is PARTICULARLY awesome – if only we could tell you what it is…Let us know what you think on thee Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Vertus Praetors.

pages.title: The Rumour Engine - 13th February, 2018 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: Time to put your detective skills to work with another brain-teaser from the Rumour Engine. Work it out, and you may well have just given yourself a sneak preview of an upcoming release. Fail, and…well, wild guessing is pretty fun anyways!Let us know what you think on the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as part of the Sector Imperialis: Imperial Sector.

pages.title: Rumour Engine - April 12th, 2017 - Warhammer Community
pages.description: What in the realms/galaxy could this be?Let us know what you think it might be over on our Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar Facebook pages.UPDATE: This image has been revealed as Horticulous Slimux.
